title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Makes Nvidia Re-Entry After 7 Months With $44M Buy
text: Popular stock picker Cathie Wood's Ark Invest on Thursday initiated a new exposure in Nvidia Inc (NASDAQ: NVDA) just seven months after it had exited all of its stake in the graphics chipmaker. St. Petersburg, California-based Ark Invest scooped up 245,286 shares.

title: Nvidia Earnings: A Battle Of Sentiment Vs. Fundamentals
text: A rather surprising reaction from Nvidia stock after the close yesterday. Earnings were poor, with growth decelerating and margins declining.

title: 7 Nvidia Analysts Break Down Long-Term Story, New Products, Data Center Growth After Q1 Print
text: Several NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA) reacted to the chipmaker's first-quarter report with lower price targets. Here's what they had to say.

title: Nvidia Q1 2023 Review: Pioneering Innovation With Innovation
text: Nvidia posted another consecutive blockbuster quarter as expected with a strong sales and earnings beat. Higher-margin data center revenues surpassed its core gaming sales for the first time. But market participants remained skeptical of Nvidia's valuation following a softer-than-expected fiscal Q2 guidance that included an estimated $500 million negative impact from Russia-Ukraine and China lockdown headwinds.

title: AMD Stock Is a Buy After Nvidia's Earnings
text: Shares of Advanced Micro Devices are heating up after Nvidia's earnings report. Here's a smart AMD stock options trade with big upside.

title: The Ratings Game: Is Nvidia's gaming forecast the ‘cut' that Wall Street has been looking for?
text: Nvidia Corp. investors may have received the all-clear signal they have been waiting for to start buying the stock again, but some on Wall Street were wondering if the signal was a clear one Thursday.

title: Why Nvidia Stock Was Up Today
text: The graphics specialist reported solid results for the first quarter.

title: NVDA Stock Stumbles as Nvidia Earnings Disappoint
text: NVDA stock is retreating after the chip maker's Q2 revenue guidance came in below analysts' average estimate. The post NVDA Stock Stumbles as Nvidia Earnings Disappoint appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Why Nvidia Shares Are On The Move Today
text: NVIDIA Corp (NASDAQ: NVDA) shares are trading lower Thursday after the company reported financial results and issued guidance below analyst estimates. Nvidia said first-quarter revenue grew 46% year-over-year to $8.29 billion, which beat the estimate of $8.12 billion, according to data from .

title: NVIDIA (NVDA) Q1 Earnings Beat, Stock Falls on Dim Q2 Guidance
text: NVIDIA's (NVDA) first-quarter fiscal 2023 results reflect the benefits of higher demand for its graphics chips used in data centers and gaming consoles.

title: 'Highest-Quality Growth Stock:' Nvidia Analyst Shrugs Off Gloomy Guidance
text: Nvidia Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA) cast a pall of gloom on the tech sector on Wednesday by providing underwhelming guidance for the second quarter. An Nvidia bull, however, chose to stick with his bullish stance.

title: 2 More Tumbling Tech Stocks Aren't Holding the Nasdaq Back
text: Thursday morning offered some more gains for the hard-hit stock market index.

title: S&P, Dow futures edge higher ahead of GDP data; Nvidia slides
text: Futures tracking the Dow and S&P 500 rose on Thursday, ahead of data that will likely offer clues on how the U.S. economy fared amid persistently high inflation, while shares of Nvidia fell after the chipmaker's dismal outlook.

title: Market Snapshot: U.S. stock futures mixed, with more weakness for tech after Nvidia disappoints
text: U.S. stock index futures were little changed on Thursday, with the technology sector wobbly after bleak forecasts from Nvidia Corp. and other companies, following a session of gains.
